summary: In this chapter, the author shares a pivotal moment from his youth when a tragic accident changed the course of his life. A baseball bat to the face resulted in serious injuries, leading to a medically induced coma and a long road to recovery. Through adversity, he learned invaluable lessons about resilience and the power of small habits. The experience shaped his understanding of how consistent, small improvements can lead to remarkable results over time. Ultimately, this journey inspired him to write this book, intending to help others fulfill their potential as well.

visual_theme.style: Inspirational and resilient, reflecting on recovery and personal growth

slides.section_body: On the final day of my sophomore year, an accident turned my world upside down when a baseball bat struck me in the face. The collision resulted in multiple skull fractures and a severe brain injury. I lost consciousness and was rushed to the hospital, marking the beginning of a grueling recovery journey.
slides.quote: Sometimes the toughest challenges pave the way for the greatest growth.

slides.section_body: Arriving at the local hospital, my condition rapidly deteriorated. I struggled with basic functions and had my first seizure. Doctors determined I needed to be airlifted to a larger hospital to save my life. This was the start of my battles, both physical and mental.
slides.quote: In moments of crisis, our true strength is revealed.

slides.section_body: As I was placed into a medically induced coma, my family faced their own fears and uncertainties. They encountered familiar territory as they had been here a decade earlier with my sister’s serious illness. The night felt endless, filled with hope and dread.
slides.quote: Even in darkness, hope flickers for those who dare to believe.

slides.section_body: When I finally awoke, the aftermath of my injury was stark; I returned home with significant facial injuries and emotional scars. The struggle to regain normalcy began, dancing between fear and determination as I wanted to return to the baseball field.
slides.quote: Recovery is not just physical; it is a journey of the spirit.

slides.section_body: Life slowed down as I learned to navigate a different reality. Challenges loomed as I found myself cut from the varsity team, which was a major blow after years of dedication to the sport. Humiliation threatened to overshadow my determination.
slides.quote: Sometimes setbacks are setups for comebacks.

slides.section_body: Two years post-injury, I discovered the surprising potential of small habits in shaping my life. I focused on building positive routines that began to stack up, both on and off the field, leading to increased confidence and competence.
slides.quote: Small habits compound over time, leading to momentous change.

slides.section_body: The transition to college marked another turning point. I embraced the clean slate, joining the baseball team and committing to healthier routines. My college experience reignited my drive for success, both academically and athletically.
slides.quote: Every day is a chance to start fresh.

slides.section_body: As I grew stronger physically and academically, I began to excel, ultimately becoming a college athlete. Despite my past, I shattered expectations and accomplished measurable success, from being team captain to excelling in academics.
slides.quote: Fulfilling your potential is a journey, not a destination.

slides.section_body: Looking back, I recognize the pivotal role small habits played in my recovery and success. Instead of one grand transformation, it was a series of small wins that paved the way to fulfillment.
slides.quote: Sustained change happens through the accumulation of small choices.

slides.section_body: My experiences have inspired me to share practical strategies for building habit-based success. In the chapters to follow, I’ll connect insights from various fields to equip you with the tools you need for a lifetime of improvement.
slides.quote: Your greatest asset is your ability to cultivate habits that uplift and empower.
